interface.name: SocketOption
interface.javadoc:
A socket option associated with a socket.

In the {@link java.nio.channels channels} package, the {@link java.nio.channels.NetworkChannel} interface defines the {@link java.nio.channels.NetworkChannel#setOption(SocketOption,Object) setOption}and {@link java.nio.channels.NetworkChannel#getOption(SocketOption) getOption}methods to set and query the channel's socket options. The type of the socket option value. 1.7 StandardSocketOptions
Returns the name of the socket option.
Returns the type of the socket option value.
